README.html.title: Diagnostics | LinksPlatform's Platform.Diagnostics Library
README.html.keywords: Diagnostics LinksPlatform's Platform.Diagnostics Class Library. Namespace: Platform.Diagnostics Forked from: LinksPlatform/Helpers/Diagnostics NuGet package: Platform.Diagnostics Documentation PDF file with code for e-readers. Mystery files docfx.json and toc.yml - DocFX build configuration. format-csharp-files.py - script for formatting .cs files as a part of tex file. format-document.sh - script for formatting tex file for generating PDF from it. generate-pdf.sh - script that generates PDF with code for e-readers. publish-docs.sh - script that publishes generated documentation and PDF with code for e-readers to gh-pages branch. publish-release.sh - script for publishing release of current package version on GitHub . push-nuget.sh - script for publishing current version of NuGet package.

Измеряет время, которое занимает выполнение действия, выполняя его и используя System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch .
